title: Cooking Experiments
content: Try making homemade pasta from scratch using flour and eggs. Experiment with different sauces such as pesto made from fresh basil, arrabbiata with chili peppers, and creamy Alfredo. Document each attempt with notes on texture, flavor, and improvements for future cooking sessions.

title: Photography Ideas
content: Experiment with night photography using long exposure techniques. Capture city lights to create light trails and star trails in rural areas. Consider using a tripod and remote shutter release to avoid camera shake. Post-processing can enhance contrast and highlight details in low-light conditions.

title: Travel Bucket List
content: Kyoto in spring is famous for cherry blossoms and traditional temples. Patagonia offers breathtaking hiking trails with glaciers and mountain ranges. Icelandâ€™s waterfalls and geothermal landscapes provide unique natural experiences. Each destination should be researched for best travel seasons and cultural highlights.

title: Fitness Routine
content: Plan a balanced 30-minute workout that includes 10 minutes of cardio to improve endurance, 15 minutes of strength training focusing on core and legs, and 5 minutes of stretching to enhance flexibility. This routine should be repeated three times a week to maintain consistency and track progress.

title: Vue Project Plan
content: The new Vue project will start with Vite for fast bundling and development. Pinia will be used for state management to keep the application scalable, while Vue Router will handle navigation between multiple views. TailwindCSS will provide a utility-first approach to styling, ensuring a consistent design system across components.

title: Outdated Study Material
content: This note contains old study resources from a previous semester. The information is no longer accurate because the curriculum has changed, and newer references are available. It should not be used for current learning but can remain as a record of past materials.

title: NestJS API Structure
content: A REST API will be built using NestJS. Authentication will be handled with JWT tokens to secure endpoints. CRUD operations will be implemented for notes, including create, read, update, and delete functionality. The project will also include middleware for logging and error handling.

title: Old Research Draft
content: Contains outdated notes from a research project on renewable energy. The data is no longer relevant due to newer studies and updated statistics. This draft should not be used for current work but can remain as a historical reference.

title: Cancelled Event
content: The concert scheduled for last weekend was cancelled due to severe weather conditions. Tickets were refunded, and organizers announced that a new date will be planned later in the year. Attendees should check official channels for updates.
